name: R5-ProvenanceEntityRole-R4-ProvenanceEntityRole
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ProvenanceEntityRole into a FHIR R4 ProvenanceEntityRole

element.display: The record resulting from this event adheres to the protocol, guideline, order set or other definition represented by this entity.
An entity that is copied in full or part by an agent that is not the author of the entity.

target.display: The repeat of (some or all of) an entity, such as text or image, by someone who might or might not be its original author.

element.display: An entity that is removed from accessibility, usually through the DELETE operator.

target.display: A derivation for which the entity is removed from accessibility usually through the use of the Delete operation.

element.display: An entity that is used by the activity to produce a new version of that entity.

target.display: A derivation for which the resulting entity is a revised version of some original.

element.display: An entity that is used as input to the activity that produced the target.

target.display: A primary source for a topic refers to something produced by some agent with direct experience and knowledge about the topic, at the time of the topic's study, without benefit from hindsight.
